text: This just in : Jimmy Kimmel hates Krystal from The Bachelor just as much as Kendall probably does. On Monday ’ s Jimmy Kimmel Live!, the late - night host applauded Arie Luyendyk Jr. ’ s decision to send home Krystal ( this season ’ s villain ) during last night ’ s episode of The Bachelor. After venting about the recently eliminated contestant, Kimmel unveiled a video compilation of “ the weird, annoying sounds [ Krystal ] makes with her body and mouth ” and, well, see for yourself.
